title: Hooded Herringbone Boy's Fleece Soft Spa Kimono Long Robe, Kids Comfy Sleepwear Bathrobe
features: 100% Polyester. Better wear after drying the body. Make the kid comfy as a mother's hug. Slip into this beautiful all-season fleece robe and relax. Grey Color robe with a warm hood, traditional patch pockets, double lips, and a belt.
Wash it at least once before first wearing it. Material: Imported, High quality, durable, and super soft eco-friendly fabric.Non-absorbent. 60 days of customer service.
Care Instructions: Machine Washable Cold on Gently Cycle Only, No Bleach, Tumble Dry Low. No Iron is needed.

This grey robe is soft enough, non-absorbent, and also cozy, and elegant. Double belt loops and ties help secure a perfect fit around your waist. Machine washable; see product description for easy care instructions and best practices. Please visit our Amazon store to view many other Luxury items in this shopping season.

4-5 Years: Robe length 28 in, Chests 34 in, Shoulder to shoulder 16 in|| 6-7 Years: Robe length 31 in, Chests 36 in, Shoulder to shoulder 17 in|| 8-9 Years: Robe length 34 in, Chests 38 in, Shoulder to shoulder 18 in|| 10-12 Years: Robe length 37 in, Chests 40 in, Shoulder to shoulder 19 in
description: Safe color base with a Hood.It is double stitched for durability. Long robe covers shins to keep your whole body warm Large hood to keep your ears and neck warm Two large patch pockets Double belt loops for a custom fit Standard length (see sizing recommendations below)
Wash in cool water with like colors and Dry on low heat.We recommend using a light detergent and washing with other soft materials to keep your robe looking it's best.
